CONGRATULATIONS!

You have fought hard and bested the best.
BUT this isn't the end!!!
Purchase Street Fighter® X Tekken® NOW and experience what real high-impact fighting is all about!

FÉLICITATIONS !

Vous avez lutté avec vaillance et vaincu les meilleurs !
Ce n'est pas fini.
Avec la sortie de Street Fighter® X Tekken®, vous aurez plus de coups, plus de combattants et plus d'arènes explosives à découvrir !

GLÜCKWUNSCH!

Du hast hart gekämpft und die Besten besiegt!
Doch das war noch nicht alles.
Mit der Veröffentlichung von Street Fighter® X Tekken® erhältst du noch mehr Moves, noch mehr Kämpfer und noch explosivere Levels, in denen du kämpfen kannst!

CONGRATULAZIONI!

Hai combattuto duramente e hai sconfitto i migliori!
Ma non finisce qui.
Con la pubblicazione di Street Fighter® X Tekken® avrai a disposizione più mosse, più lottatori e arene ancora più esplosive in cui combattere!

¡ENHORABUENA!

¡Has luchado con fiereza y has alcanzado la cima de la grandeza!
Pero esto no acaba aquí.
Con el lanzamiento de Street Fighter® X Tekken® tendrás a tu disposición más movimientos, más luchadores y más niveles explosivos en los que combatir!

CONGRATULATIONS!

You have fought hard and bested the best.
BUT this isn't the end!!!
Purchase Street Fighter® X Tekken® NOW and experience what real high-impact fighting is all about!

In Street Fighter® X Tekken® – PlayStation®Home Fighter your aim is to take down your opponent using skill, cunning and pure brute force.
Dans Street Fighter® X Tekken® - Playstation®Home Combattant, vous devez vaincre votre adversaire en faisant preuve d'adresse, de ruse et de puissance.
Bei "Street Fighter® X Tekken® – PlayStation®Home Fighter" musst du den Gegner mit Geschick, List und roher Gewalt besiegen.
In Street Fighter® X Tekken® - PlayStation®Home Fighter l'obiettivo è abbattere il tuo avversario usando abilità, ingegno e pura forza bruta.
En Street Fighter® X Tekken® - PlayStation®Home Fighter el objetivo es eliminar al rival mediante tu habilidad, astucia y fuerza bruta.
In Street Fighter® X Tekken® – PlayStation®Home Fighter your aim is to take down your opponent using skill, cunning and pure brute force.
STREET FIGHTER™ X TEKKEN™ - PlayStation®Home Fighter에서 여러분의 목적은 기술, 정교함, 그리고 순순하게 압도적인 힘으로 상대방을 무너뜨리는 것입니다.
In STREET FIGHTER™ X TEKKEN™ – PlayStation®Home Fighter your aim is to take down your opponent using skill, cunning and pure brute force.
在「STREET FIGHTER™ X TEKKEN™ - PlayStation®Home Fighter」中，你的目的是以技巧、狡猾和純​​蠻力擊倒你的對手。
在「STREET FIGHTER™ X TEKKEN™ - PlayStation®Home Fighter」中，你的目的是以技巧、狡猾和純​​蠻力擊倒你的對手。
In Street Fighter® X Tekken® – PlayStation®Home Fighter your aim is to take down your opponent using skill, cunning and pure brute force.
You and your opponent each take turns to attack and defend by selecting different combinations of moves and blocks. Each turn allows players to choose three moves at a time.
Votre adversaire et vous attaquez et défendez à tour de rôle en sélectionnant différentes combinaisons de coups et de parades. Vous pouvez choisir trois coups par tour.
Du wechselst dich mit deinem Gegner in Angriff und Abwehr ab, indem ihr unterschiedliche Kombinationen aus Moves und Blocks ausführt. Jeder Spieler kann pro Zug je drei Moves auswählen.
Tu e il tuo avversario vi attaccherete e difenderete a turni selezionando diverse combinazioni di mosse e parate. Ogni turno permette ai giocatori di scegliere tre mosse alla volta.
Tú y tu rival os atacaréis y defenderéis por turnos seleccionando distintas combinaciones de movimientos y bloqueos. En cada turno, los jugadores podrán elegir tres movimientos.
You and your opponent each take turns to attack and defend by selecting different combinations of moves and blocks. Each turn allows players to choose three moves at a time.
당신과 당신의 상대는 각각 다양한 동작을 조합하여 공격과 방어를 반복합니다. 플레이어는 각 턴별로 3가지의 동작을 선택할 수 있습니다.
You and your opponent each take turns to attack and defend by selecting different combinations of moves and blocks. Each turn allows players to choose three moves at a time.
你和你的對手將透過選擇不同的招式和防守組合輪流作出攻擊和防守。各位玩家每次能選擇三個動作。
你和你的對手將透過選擇不同的招式和防守組合輪流作出攻擊和防守。各位玩家每次能選擇三個動作。
You and your opponent each take turns to attack and defend by selecting different combinations of moves and blocks. Each turn allows players to choose three moves at a time.
Build your special attack energy to tag-in either Ryu or Kazuya and gain access to their devastating Special Attacks!
Cumulez de l'énergie dans votre jauge spéciale pour faire intervenir Ryu ou Kazuya et profiter de leurs attaques spéciales dévastatrices !
Sammle Special Move-Energie, um Ryu oder Kazuya einzuwechseln und ihre vernichtenden Special Moves einzusetzen!
Incrementa l'energia del tuo attacco speciale per far entrare Ryu o Kazuya e poter utilizzare i loro devastanti attacchi speciali!
Logra energía de ataque especial para dar el relevo a Ryu o Kazuya y tener acceso a sus devastadores ataques especiales.
Build your special attack energy to tag-in either Ryu or Kazuya and gain access to their devastating Special Attacks!
특수 공격 에너지를 모아서 류 혹은 카즈야를 태그-인하고 그들의 폭발적인 특수 공격을 사용하세요!
Build your special attack energy to tag-in either Ryu or Kazuya and gain access to their devastating Special Attacks!
儲備特別攻擊能量，與隆或一八組隊，並獲得使用角色相關的極大威力特別攻擊！
儲備特別攻擊能量，與隆或一八組隊，並獲得使用角色相關的極大威力特別攻擊！
Build your special attack energy to tag-in either Ryu or Kazuya and gain access to their devastating Special Attacks!
Choose your three attacks from the six options available, including High, Mid and Low attacks. When making your selection, holding the corresponding button will cause the Power Meter to appear.

Sélectionnez vos trois attaques parmi les six options disponibles : attaques hautes, mi-hautes et basses. En effectuant votre choix, maintenir la touche correspondante fera apparaître la jauge de puissance.
Wähle drei der sechs verfügbaren Angriffe Oben, in der Mitte und Unten. Wenn du bei deiner Auswahl die entsprechende Taste gedrückt hältst, erscheint die Kraftanzeige.
Scegli i tuoi tre attacchi dalle sei opzioni disponibili, divisi in Alti, Medi e Bassi. Quando hai scelto, tieni premuto il tasto corrispondente per far apparire l'indicatore di potenza.

Elige tus tres ataques entre las seis opciones disponibles que incluyen ataques altos, bajos y medios. Al hacer tu elección, mantener pulsado el botón correspondiente hará que aparezca tu medidor de potencia.
Choose your three attacks from the six options available, including High, Mid and Low attacks. When making your selection, holding the corresponding button will cause the Power Meter to appear.
상단, 중단, 하단으로 이루어진 6가지 공격 형태 중 3가지를 선택하세요. 공격을 선택할 때, 지정된 버튼을 누르고 있으면 파워 미터가 생깁니다.
Choose your three attacks from the six options available, including High, Mid and Low attacks. When making your selection, holding the corresponding button will cause the Power Meter to appear.
從六個可用選項中選擇三個攻擊，包括高段、中段和低段攻擊。只要在做出選擇時按住相應的按鈕，便會顯示能量表。
從六個可用選項中選擇三個攻擊，包括高段、中段和低段攻擊。只要在做出選擇時按住相應的按鈕，便會顯示能量表。
Choose your three attacks from the six options available, including High, Mid and Low attacks. When making your selection, holding the corresponding button will cause the Power Meter to appear.
Release the button when the arrows reach the "sweet spot" to make your attack unblockable. High attacks deal the most damage, Mid attacks deal medium damage and Low attacks deal the least damage.

Quand les flèches atteignent le "point idéal", relâchez la touche pour lancer une attaque imparable. Les attaques hautes infligent un maximum de dégâts, les attaques mi-hautes des dégâts moyens et les attaques basses causent peu de dégâts.

Lass die Taste los, wenn die Pfeile den Idealpunkt erreichen. Dann ist dein Angriff nicht mehr abzuwehren. Angriffe oben fügen den meisten Schaden zu, Angriffe in der Mitte mittleren Schaden und Angriffe unten den geringsten Schaden.

Rilascia il tasto quando la freccia raggiunge il "punto ottimale" per rendere il tuo attacco inarrestabile. Gli attacchi Alti infliggono il danno maggiore, quelli Medi danno medio e quelli Bassi infliggono il danno più basso.

Suelta el botón cuando las flechas alcancen el “punto ideal” para que tu ataque sea imposible de bloquear. Los ataques altos infligen mucho daño, los medios, daños normales y los bajos, el menor daño.
Release the button when the arrows reach the "sweet spot" to make your attack unblockable. High attacks deal the most damage, Mid attacks deal medium damage and Low attacks deal the least damage.
화살표가 "적정 지점"을 가리킬 때 버튼을 놓으시면 공격은 막을 수 없게 됩니다. 상단 공격은 가장 큰 피해를 주며, 중단 공격은 중간 정도의 피해를, 하단 공격이 가장 적은 피해를 줍니다.
Release the button when the arrows reach the "sweet spot" to make your attack unblockable. High attacks deal the most damage, Mid attacks deal medium damage and Low attacks deal the least damage.
請把握時機在箭頭達到「最佳位置」時放開按鈕，確保對手無法招架你的攻擊。高段攻擊可造成最大損傷；中段攻擊造成中等損傷，而低段攻擊造成的損傷則為最小。
請把握時機在箭頭達到「最佳位置」時放開按鈕，確保對手無法招架你的攻擊。高段攻擊可造成最大損傷；中段攻擊造成中等損傷，而低段攻擊造成的損傷則為最小。
Release the button when the arrows reach the "sweet spot" to make your attack unblockable. High attacks deal the most damage, Mid attacks deal medium damage and Low attacks deal the least damage.

When defending, choose your three blocks from the High, Mid and Low blocks available. If the height of your block matches that of your opponent’s attack for a particular move, your block will be successful and you will not take any damage.

Lorsque vous défendez, sélectionnez vos trois parades parmi les parades haute, mi-haute et basse disponibles. Si la hauteur de votre parade correspond à la hauteur de l'attaque portée par votre adversaire, votre geste sera réussi et vous ne subirez aucun dégât.

Wähle für deine Abwehr drei der zur Verfügung stehenden High-, Mid- und Low-Blocks aus. Wenn die Höhe deiner Abwehr der Höhe des gegnerischen Angriffs entspricht, ist deine Abwehr erfolgreich und du nimmst keinen Schaden.

In difesa, scegli le tue tre parate fra Alta, Media e Bassa. Se l'altezza della tua parata corrisponde all'attacco dell'avversario per una mossa in particolare, la parata avrà successo e non subirai alcun danno.

Cuando defiendas, elige tus tres bloqueos entre los bloqueos altos, medios y bajos disponibles. Si la altura de tu bloqueo se corresponde con el del ataque de tu rival para un movimiento determinado, el bloqueo tendrá éxito y no recibirás daño alguno.

When defending, choose your three blocks from the High, Mid and Low blocks available. If the height of your block matches that of your opponent’s attack for a particular move, your block will be successful and you will not take any damage.
방어 시에는 방어할 수 있는 상, 중, 하단의 3가지 방어 중에 3가지를 고르게 됩니다. 만약 당신의 방어 위치가 상대방의 공격위치와 일치하면, 방어는 성공하며 당신은 피해를 입지 않습니다.

When defending, choose your three blocks from the High, Mid and Low blocks available. If the height of your block matches that of your opponent’s attack for a particular move, your block will be successful and you will not take any damage.
防禦時請從高段、中段和低段防禦之間選出三個防禦方式。如果你的防禦高度與對戰對手某一特定招數的攻擊契合，你的防禦就能成功，而你也不會受到任何損傷。
防禦時請從高段、中段和低段防禦之間選出三個防禦方式。如果你的防禦高度與對戰對手某一特定招數的攻擊契合，你的防禦就能成功，而你也不會受到任何損傷。

When defending, choose your three blocks from the High, Mid and Low blocks available. If the height of your block matches that of your opponent’s attack for a particular move, your block will be successful and you will not take any damage.

When selecting a block, hitting the "sweet spot" on the Power Meter will result in your character performing a perfect block, provided that the height of the block matches the height of the attack. Even perfect attacks can be blocked in this way.

Lorsque vous sélectionnez une parade, essayez d'atteindre le "point idéal" sur la jauge de puissance pour que votre personnage réussisse son contre (à condition que la hauteur de la parade soit identique à celle de l'attaque). De cette façon, vous pouvez même contrer les attaques parfaites.

Wenn du bei der Auswahl deines Blocks den Idealpunkt in der Kraftanzeige triffst, kontert dein Charakter – vorausgesetzt, die Höhe deines Blocks entspricht der des Angriffs. So können selbst perfekte Angriffe abgewehrt werden.

Quando scegli una parata, centrare il "punto ottimale" sull'indicatore di potenza farà eseguire una contromossa al tuo personaggio, in caso l'altezza della parata corrisponda a quella dell'attacco. Anche attacchi perfetti possono essere contrattaccati così.

Cuando elijas un bloqueo, acertar en el “punto ideal” del medidor de potencia hará que tu personaje realice un contraataque, siempre y cuando la altura del bloqueo se corresponda con la del ataque. De este modo, se puede contraatacar incluso frente a ataques perfectos.

When selecting a block, hitting the "sweet spot" on the Power Meter will result in your character performing a counter move, provided that the height of the block matches the height of the attack. Even perfect attacks can be countered in this way.
방어를 선택할 때 파워 미터의 "적정 지점"을 맞출 수 있다면, 방어의 위치가 공격과 일치한다는 가정하에 당신의 캐릭터는 완벽한 방어를 행하게 됩니다. 이런 경우는 퍼펙트 어택도 방어가 가능합니다.

When selecting a block, hitting the "sweet spot" on the Power Meter will result in your character performing a perfect block, provided the height of the block matches the height of the attack. Even perfect attacks can be blocked in this way.
在選擇一個防禦方式時，把握時機在能量表達到「最佳位置」時按鈕，將讓你的角色執行完美防禦，但前題是防禦高度與攻擊高度相契合。在這條件下，即使是對方施展完美攻擊也可完全防禦。
在選擇一個防禦方式時，把握時機在能量表達到「最佳位置」時按鈕，將讓你的角色執行完美防禦，但前題是防禦高度與攻擊高度相契合。在這條件下，即使是對方施展完美攻擊也可完全防禦。

When selecting a block, hitting the "sweet spot" on the Power Meter will result in your character performing a perfect block, provided that the height of the block matches the height of the attack. Even perfect attacks can be blocked in this way.

You can build up your Special Bar by successfully landing attacks or performing blocks. When you have enough Special Attack energy, you will be prompted to tag-in your partner by pressing [L2] + [R2].

Vous pouvez alimenter votre jauge spéciale en réussissant des attaques et des parades. Lorsque vous disposez de suffisamment d'énergie, vous avez la possibilité de faire intervenir votre partenaire en appuyant sur [L2] + [R2].
Durch erfolgreiche Angriffe oder Blocks füllt sich dein Special-Balken. Wenn du genug Special Move-Energie gesammelt hast, wirst du aufgefordert, deinen Partner mit [L2] + [R2] einzuwechseln.

Puoi incrementare la Barra Speciale mettendo a segno attacchi o effettuando parate. Quando hai abbastanza energia per un attacco speciale, ti verrà indicato di far entrare il tuo partner premendo [L2] + [R2].
Puedes rellenar tu barra especial realizando ataques o bloqueos con éxito. Cuando tengas suficiente energía de ataque especial, podrás dar el relevo a tu compañero pulsando [L2]+[R2].

You can build up your Special Bar by successfully landing attacks or performing blocks. When you have enough Special Attack energy, you will be prompted to tag-in your partner by pressing [L2] + [R2].
여러분은 성공적인 공격을 하거나, 성공적인 방어를 통해 특수 바를 채울 수 있습니다. 특수 공격 에너지가 충분히 모이면, 여러분은 [L2]+[R2]를 눌러 파트너를 태그-인할 수 있게 됩니다.

You can build up your Special Bar by successfully landing attacks or performing blocks. When you have enough Special Attack energy, you will be prompted to tag-in your partner by pressing [L2] + [R2].
若要累積你的特別能量表，您需要成功施展攻擊或防禦。當你有足夠的特別攻擊能量時，便會獲得提示讓您可藉由按下 [L2]+[R2] 的方式與拍檔聯手攻擊。
若要累積你的特別能量表，您需要成功施展攻擊或防禦。當你有足夠的特別攻擊能量時，便會獲得提示讓您可藉由按下 [L2]+[R2] 的方式與拍檔聯手攻擊。

You can build up your Special Bar by successfully landing attacks or performing blocks. When you have enough Special Attack energy, you will be prompted to tag-in your partner by pressing [L2] + [R2].

請在可用招式表中選擇並施展STREET FIGHTER™ X TEKKEN™的各種強力攻擊。
請在可用招式表中選擇並施展STREET FIGHTER™ X TEKKEN™的各種強力攻擊。
Choose from the list of available moves to unleash these powerful attacks from Street Fighter® X Tekken®.
